thread.title: Jim Randerson
thread.title_full: Manufacturer Express, Inc. reviewed by Jim Randerson

author: Jim Randerson
title: Jim Randerson
text: I had trouble with my credit card online. Problem was me. I called the toll free number and got great help immediately. My wireless tow lights came in just a couple days. They work perfectly, I couldn't be more pleased with the lights, the service, and Manufacturer Express! Thanks!
